snippet: President Obama announced plans aimed at guarding the electricity supply; improving local planning for flooding, coastal erosion and storm surges; and better predicting landslide risks.
abstract: Pres Obama announces climate change initiatives aimed at guarding nation's electricity supply; proposals include improvement of local planning for dealing with flooding, coastal erosion and storm surges, and better methods for predicting landslide risks.
lead_paragraph: President Obama announced plans aimed at guarding the electricity supply; improving local planning for flooding, coastal erosion and storm surges; and better predicting landslide risks.

headline.sub: President Obama Announces Actions to Prepare for Catastrophic Weather Events
headline.main: White House Announces Climate Change Initiatives
headline.print_headline: White House Announces Climate Change Initiatives
